review: I've had the Fire Stick for a couple of weeks now, overall it seemed like the best option for the money and I have always preferred Amazon products. However, I have had constant trouble with buffering on all the apps (I have high speed internet and still can't make it through a show without multiple breaks) and it often freezes up on the home screen. I don't know what to do! Unfortunately, if I had to do it over again I would not purchase this product.
author: Christine

review: This is great!  I have never owned any of the other streaming products except for Blu-ray.  I have a blu ray in two rooms, but I spend a lot of time in my kitchen and the fire stick is great for that!  I have access to all my music as well as the prime music, prime videos and Netflix, etc.  I don't know how I ever made do without it!  it was easy to install, basically plugged it in to the tv and to the wall.  Bingo - works perfectly!
author: Tammy Airey
